verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>
<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> 'I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> as they <S%H4639>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> where you <S%H3427>lived:<s%> and you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> as they <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> where I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> <S%H3212>you;<s%> neither shall you walk in their <S%H2708>statutes.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H3068>them:<s%> I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>does,<s%> he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in <S%H3068>them:<s%> I am Yahweh.
<S%H7126><s%>"'None of you shall approach <S%H376>anyone<s%> who are his <S%H7607>close<s%> <S%H1320>relatives,<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> their <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> nor the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H517>mother:<s%> she is your <S%H517>mother.<s%> You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife:<s%> it is your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> or the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of your <S%H517>mother,<s%> whether <S%H4138>born<s%> at <S%H1004>home,<s%> or <S%H4138>born<s%> <S%H2351>abroad.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> or of your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> even their <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> for <S%H2007>theirs<s%> is your own <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H4138>conceived<s%> by your <S%H1>father,<s%> since she is your <S%H269>sister.<s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H269>sister:<s%> she is your <S%H1>father<s%>'s near <S%H7607>kinswoman.<s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H269>sister:<s%> for she is your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s near <S%H7607>kinswoman.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>approach<s%> his <S%H802>wife:<s%> she is your <S%H1733>aunt.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1121>daughter-in<s%>-law: she is your son's <S%H802>wife.<s%> You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H802>wife:<s%> it is your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> or her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they are near <S%H7608>kinswomen:<s%> it is <S%H2154>wickedness.<s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'You shall not take a <S%H802>wife<s%> to her <S%H269>sister,<s%> to be a <S%H6887>rival,<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> while her sister is yet <S%H2416>alive.<s%>
<S%H7126><s%>"'You shall not approach a <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> as long as she is <S%H5079>impure<s%> by her <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>
<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not <S%H7903>lie<s%> <S%H2233>carnally<s%> with your <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> and defile yourself with <S%H2930>her.<s%>

<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not give any of your <S%H2233>children<s%> to <S%H5674>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech;<s%> neither shall you <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H7901><s%>"'You shall not lie with a <S%H2145>man,<s%> as <S%H4904>with<s%> a <S%H802>woman.<s%> That is <S%H8441>detestable.<s%>

<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not <S%H7903>lie<s%> with any <S%H929>animal<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourself with <S%H802>it;<s%> neither shall any woman <S%H5975>give<s%> <S%H6440>herself<s%> to an <S%H929>animal,<s%> to lie <S%H7250>down<s%> with <S%H8397>it:<s%> it is a perversion.

<S%H2930><s%>"'Don't defile yourselves in any of these <S%H428>things:<s%> for in all these the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which I am casting <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you were <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>
The <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2930>defiled:<s%> therefore I <S%H6485>punished<s%> its <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> vomited <S%H6958>out<s%> her <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>

You therefore shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> any of these <S%H8441>abominations;<s%> neither the <S%H249>native-born,<s%> nor the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> among <S%H8432>you;<s%>

(for all <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> have the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6213>done,<s%> that were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H776>you,<s%> and the land became <S%H2930>defiled<s%>);
that the <S%H776>land<s%> not vomit you <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H2930>also,<s%> when you defile <S%H6958>it,<s%> as it vomited out the <S%H1471>nation<s%> that was before <S%H6440>you.<s%>

<S%H6213><s%>"'For whoever shall do any of these <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> even the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> them shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Therefore you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4931>requirements,<s%> that you do not <S%H6213>practice<s%> any of these <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H2708>customs,<s%> which were <S%H6213>practiced<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2930>you,<s%> and that you do not defile yourselves with <S%H3068>them:<s%> I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God.<s%>'"
